pages.title: Ender Dropper
pages.text: The Ender Dropper is the counterpart to the Ender Hopper. With every redstone push it ejects an item from your personal Ender Chest.$(br2)Beware: The Ender Dropper only works as long as you are online. And who is stopping anyone from placing a button next to it and emptying your Ender Chest?
